label: uncl1229
comment: Code specifying the action to be taken or already taken.

values.label: Added
values.comment: The information is to be or has been added.

values.label: Deleted
values.comment: The information is to be or has been deleted.

values.label: Changed
values.comment: The information is to be or has been changed.

values.label: No action
values.comment: This line item is not affected by the actual message.

values.label: Accepted without amendment
values.comment: This line item is entirely accepted by the seller.

values.label: Accepted with amendment
values.comment: This line item is accepted but amended by the seller.

values.label: Not accepted
values.comment: This line item is not accepted by the seller.

values.label: Schedule only
values.comment: Code specifying that the message is a schedule only.

values.label: Amendments
values.comment: Code specifying that amendments are requested/notified.

values.label: Not found
values.comment: This line item is not found in the referenced message.

values.label: Not amended
values.comment: This line is not amended by the buyer.

values.label: Line item numbers changed
values.comment: Code specifying that the line item numbers have changed.

values.label: Buyer has deducted amount
values.comment: Buyer has deducted amount from payment.

values.label: Buyer claims against invoice
values.comment: Buyer has a claim against an outstanding invoice.

values.label: Charge back by seller
values.comment: Factor has been requested to charge back the outstanding item.

values.label: Seller will issue credit note
values.comment: Seller agrees to issue a credit note.

values.label: Terms changed for new terms
values.comment: New settlement terms have been agreed.

values.label: Abide outcome of negotiations
values.comment: Factor agrees to abide by the outcome of negotiations between seller and buyer.

values.label: Seller rejects dispute
values.comment: Seller does not accept validity of dispute.

values.label: Settlement
values.comment: The reported situation is settled.

values.label: No delivery
values.comment: Code indicating that no delivery will be required.

values.label: Call-off delivery
values.comment: A request for delivery of a particular quantity of goods to be delivered on a particular date (or within a particular period).

values.label: Proposed amendment
values.comment: A code used to indicate an amendment suggested by the sender.

values.label: Accepted with amendment, no confirmation required
values.comment: Accepted with changes which require no confirmation.

values.label: Equipment provisionally repaired
values.comment: The equipment or component has been provisionally repaired.

values.label: Included
values.comment: Code indicating that the entity is included.

values.label: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall cover you when due as per your instructions
values.comment: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall cover you when due as per your instructions.

values.label: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall authorize you to debit our account with you when due
values.comment: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall authorize you to debit our account with you when due.

values.label: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall cover you when due as per your instructions
values.comment: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall cover you when due as per your instructions.

values.label: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall authorize you to debit our account with you when due
values.comment: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall authorize you to debit our account with you when due.

values.label: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall credit your account with us when due
values.comment: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall credit your account with us when due.

values.label: Credit advice requested for direct debit
values.comment: A credit advice is requested for the direct debit.

values.label: Credit advice and acknowledgement for direct debit
values.comment: A credit advice and acknowledgement are requested for the direct debit.

values.label: Inquiry
values.comment: Request for information.

values.label: Checked
values.comment: Checked.

values.label: Not checked
values.comment: Not checked.

values.label: Cancelled
values.comment: Discontinued.

values.label: Replaced
values.comment: Provide a replacement.

values.label: New
values.comment: Not existing before.

values.label: Agreed
values.comment: Consent.

values.label: Proposed
values.comment: Put forward for consideration.

values.label: Already delivered
values.comment: Delivery has taken place.

values.label: Additional subordinate structures will follow
values.comment: Additional subordinate structures will follow the current hierarchy level.

values.label: Additional subordinate structures will not follow
values.comment: No additional subordinate structures will follow the current hierarchy level.

values.label: Result opposed
values.comment: A notification that the result is opposed.

values.label: Auction held
values.comment: A notification that an auction was held.

values.label: Legal action pursued
values.comment: A notification that legal action has been pursued.

values.label: Meeting held
values.comment: A notification that a meeting was held.

values.label: Result set aside
values.comment: A notification that the result has been set aside.

values.label: Result disputed
values.comment: A notification that the result has been disputed.

values.label: Countersued
values.comment: A notification that a countersuit has been filed.

values.label: Pending
values.comment: A notification that an action is awaiting settlement.

values.label: Court action dismissed
values.comment: A notification that a court action will no longer be heard.

values.label: Referred item, accepted
values.comment: The item being referred to has been accepted.

values.label: Referred item, rejected
values.comment: The item being referred to has been rejected.

values.label: Debit advice statement line
values.comment: Notification that the statement line is a debit advice.

values.label: Credit advice statement line
values.comment: Notification that the statement line is a credit advice.

values.label: Grouped credit advices
values.comment: Notification that the credit advices are grouped.

values.label: Grouped debit advices
values.comment: Notification that the debit advices are grouped.

values.label: Registered
values.comment: The name is registered.

values.label: Payment denied
values.comment: The payment has been denied.

values.label: Approved as amended
values.comment: Approved with modifications.

values.label: Approved as submitted
values.comment: The request has been approved as submitted.

values.label: Cancelled, no activity
values.comment: Cancelled due to the lack of activity.

values.label: Under investigation
values.comment: Investigation is being done.

values.label: Initial claim received
values.comment: Notification that the initial claim was received.

values.label: Not in process
values.comment: Not in process.

values.label: Rejected, duplicate
values.comment: Rejected because it is a duplicate.

values.label: Rejected, resubmit with corrections
values.comment: Rejected but may be resubmitted when corrected.

values.label: Pending, incomplete
values.comment: Pending because of incomplete information.

values.label: Under field office investigation
values.comment: Investigation by the field is being done.

values.label: Pending, awaiting additional material
values.comment: Pending awaiting receipt of additional material.

values.label: Pending, awaiting review
values.comment: Pending while awaiting review.

values.label: Reopened
values.comment: Opened again.

values.label: Processed by primary, forwarded to additional payer(s)
values.comment: This request has been processed by the primary payer and sent to additional payer(s).

values.label: Processed by secondary, forwarded to additional payer(s)
values.comment: This request has been processed by the secondary payer and sent to additional payer(s).

values.label: Processed by tertiary, forwarded to additional payer(s)
values.comment: This request has been processed by the tertiary payer and sent to additional payer(s).

values.label: Previous payment decision reversed
values.comment: A previous payment decision has been reversed.

values.label: Not our claim, forwarded to another payer(s)
values.comment: A request does not belong to this payer but has been forwarded to another payer(s).

values.label: Transferred to correct insurance carrier
values.comment: The request has been transferred to the correct insurance carrier for processing.

values.label: Not paid, predetermination pricing only
values.comment: Payment has not been made and the enclosed response is predetermination pricing only.

values.label: Documentation claim
values.comment: The claim is for documentation purposes only, no payment required.

values.label: Reviewed
values.comment: Assessed.

values.label: Repriced
values.comment: This price was changed.

values.label: Audited
values.comment: An official examination has occurred.

values.label: Conditionally paid
values.comment: Payment has been conditionally made.

values.label: On appeal
values.comment: Reconsideration of the decision has been applied for.

values.label: Closed
values.comment: Shut.

values.label: Reaudited
values.comment: A subsequent official examination has occurred.

values.label: Reissued
values.comment: Issued again.

values.label: Closed after reopening
values.comment: Reopened and then closed.

values.label: Redetermined
values.comment: Determined again or differently.

values.label: Processed as primary
values.comment: Processed as the first.

values.label: Processed as secondary
values.comment: Processed as the second.

values.label: Processed as tertiary
values.comment: Processed as the third.

values.label: Correction of error
values.comment: A correction to information previously communicated which contained an error.

values.label: Single credit item of a group
values.comment: Notification that the credit item is a single credit item of a group of credit items.

values.label: Single debit item of a group
values.comment: Notification that the debit item is a single debit item of a group of debit items.

values.label: Interim response
values.comment: The response is an interim one.

values.label: Final response
values.comment: The response is an final one.

values.label: Debit advice requested
values.comment: A debit advice is requested for the transaction.

values.label: Transaction not impacted
values.comment: Advice that the transaction is not impacted.

values.label: Patient to be notified
values.comment: The action to take is to notify the patient.

values.label: Healthcare provider to be notified
values.comment: The action to take is to notify the healthcare provider.

values.label: Usual general practitioner to be notified
values.comment: The action to take is to notify the usual general practitioner.

values.label: Advice without details
values.comment: An advice without details is requested or notified.

values.label: Advice with details
values.comment: An advice with details is requested or notified.

values.label: Amendment requested
values.comment: An amendment is requested.

values.label: For information
values.comment: Included for information only.

values.label: Withdraw
values.comment: A code indicating discontinuance or retraction.

values.label: Delivery date change
values.comment: The action / notiification is a change of the delivery date.

values.label: Quantity change
values.comment: The action / notification is a change of quantity.

values.label: Resale and claim
values.comment: The identified items have been sold by the distributor to the end customer, and compensation for the loss of inventory value is claimed.

values.label: Resale
values.comment: The identified items have been sold by the distributor to the end customer.

values.label: Prior addition
values.comment: This existing line item becomes available at an earlier date.

values.label: Expired
values.comment: This line has expired.

values.label: Hold
values.comment: This line is on Hold.

values.label: Open
values.comment: This line is open.
